channel.title: Cache error
channel.description:
hello i need to get rid of downloading the cache online and make the client use the one that is on the client folder!
[code]java.net.UnknownHostException: ........ at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(Unkno wn Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:129) at Update.<init>(Update.java:28) at client.method67(client.java:3907) at client.method6(client.java:7602) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:48) at client.run(client.java:5009) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: www.Devolution.justmybb.com at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(Unknown Source)
